about.title: Welcome to Al-Fares Center for Computer Repair and Data Recovery
about.intro: Your specialized center for computer repair and data recovery in Jeddah. Providing professional services since 2013.
about.description: At Al-Fares Center, we pride ourselves on providing the best computer repair and data recovery services in Jeddah. With over 12 years of experience, we use the latest global technologies such as the professional PC-3000 device to ensure the highest success rate in recovering your data.

features.title: 12 Years Experience
features.description: More than a decade of expertise in the field

features.title: Latest Equipment
features.description: We use the best global devices

features.title: Professional Team
features.description: Engineers and technicians trained to the highest standards

features.title: Quality Guarantee
features.description: Warranty on all work and repairs

services.title: Data Recovery
services.description: Professional recovery of lost data from all types of storage media

features.title: Hard Drive Recovery
features.description: All types of HDD and SSD

features.title: RAID System Recovery
features.description: All types of RAID and servers

detailedContent.intro: Whatever type of files you have, we can recover all deleted and damaged files
detailedContent.description: We use storage tools whether memory cards or flash drives to store photos and files, some of which may hold pictures representing specific memories of special value to us, so the damage or loss of those photos would cause us great sadness. Some lost files from memory or flash may be work-related or contain specific documents or scanned important files, and you may accidentally delete these files.

services.title: Data Recovery from Memory Cards and Flash Memory
services.description: Lost data can be recovered from memory cards and flash memory if they have not been permanently deleted or the device is damaged due to mechanical or electronic failure. We use the latest specialized devices for data recovery that work on most types of memory and flash memory.
steps: Ensure not to use the device after data loss
Connect the memory to specialized computer
Search for lost data using advanced devices

services.title: Data Recovery from Hard Drives
services.description: We repair all types of hard drives whether IDE or SATA from all types of failures. Repair damaged and burned hard drives, whether laptop or PC hard drives, and repair external hard drives as well as hard drives that don't read.

services.title: File Recovery from RAID Systems and Servers
services.description: We have a team of experts in data recovery from all RAID systems to solve all problems with servers and all different RAID systems from RAID 0 to RAID 10 through RAID 1 and RAID 5.
features: Treatment of HDD and SSD drives in servers
Data recovery regardless of size and number of drives

equipment.name: PC-3000
equipment.description: Professional device for recovering photos, videos, and audio files from memory

equipment.name: Rusolut
equipment.description: Specialized device for recovering photos and lost files from memory cards

services.title: Apple Device Repair
services.description: Specialized repair for MacBook and iMac devices with genuine parts

features.title: MacBook Repair
features.description: All MacBook Pro and Air models

services.title: Computer and Laptop Repair
services.description: Comprehensive repair for all types of computers and laptops

detailedContent.intro: Professional repair for all types of computers and laptops
detailedContent.description: Al-Fares Center is one of the largest laptop repair centers in Jeddah, working in the field of electronic device repair and striving to solve all computer problems that customers may face.

services.title: External Maintenance
services.description: Repair of faults resulting from dust accumulation and high temperature that lead to device freezing during work along with sudden faults

services.title: Operating System and Software
services.description: Repair of software faults, operating system, and files stored on any type of laptop

services.title: Hard Drive
services.description: Repair of hard drive faults, incorrect storage, and regular maintenance of hard drive parts

capabilities.title: Our Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: We use the latest technologies and advanced devices

items.description: The most powerful device in the world for hard drive data recovery

items.title: Clean Room
items.description: Professional dust-free work environment for safely opening hard drives

items.title: Specialized Technical Team
items.description: Engineers and technicians trained to the highest level of competence

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Simple steps to recover your data

steps.description: Call us or send a WhatsApp message

steps.title: Inspection and Diagnosis
steps.description: We inspect the device and accurately identify the problem

steps.title: Price Quote
steps.description: We provide you with a clear and specific price quote

steps.description: We start work upon your approval

steps.description: We deliver your device or data after completion
